[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Variables](./blockly.variables.md) &gt; [getVariable](./blockly.variables.getvariable.md)

## Variables.getVariable() function

Look up a variable on the given workspace. Always looks in the main workspace before looking in the flyout workspace. Always prefers lookup by ID to lookup by name + type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getVariable(workspace: Workspace, id: string | null, opt_name?: string, opt_type?: string): IVariableModel<IVariableState> | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to search for the variable. It may be a flyout workspace or main workspace. |
|  id | string \| null | The ID to use to look up the variable, or null. |
|  opt\_name | string | _(Optional)_ The string to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails. |
|  opt\_type | string | _(Optional)_ The type to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails. |

**Returns:**

[IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| null

The variable corresponding to the given ID or name + type combination, or null if not found.
